column3: Mogmont is flapping his tired wings vigilantly.
Constant conflicts between the dragons of the north and south are taking their toll on Mogmont's health. Slay three of each to give him time for much-needed rest.
You have slain the moss dragons and lower skylords. Report back to Mogmont with the good news.
Behind Mogmont's tired eyes you see a well of gratitude. The moogles must ensure that the servants of Nidhogg do not lay waste to Hraesvelgr's sacred domain.
The skylords of the north and south are in constant conflict. That is why one must remain ever vigilant, always on alert... I'm at my wit's end, kupo!
The moogles here are in desperate need of relief. If you were to put a pause to the dragons' fighting by slaying a few, it's like to give us some breathing room, kupo.
It's impossible to be on guard all day every day─slay the dragons before we collapse from exhaustion.
Ah... Now we can finally breathe without dragons bothering us! It might be time to break out the wine, kupo!
Asah is the domain of Hraesvelgr, and we can't permit Nidhogg's menacing minions to encroach upon it. May you aid us again in our time of need!
